Description: Sherd of foot and floor of black-glazed pottery fishplate; concave recess in centre; tall ring foot; wholly glazed (streakily) save for reserved band around central bowl. Inscription under floor.
Curator's comments: The amount of accreted matter on the sherd is unusual for Naukratis material.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (ID.058)
